title: Celebration of the senses: a profile of Eric Rolls
creator_credit: Don Featherstone and Australia. Special Broadcasting Service
brief_description: Looks at the life, work and world of Eric Rolls through his senses. He reads from his own writings and shows how he uses the senses in descriptive narrative. Describes the way in which he senses the world with hearing, sight, taste, smell and touch.
